verbs.description: While [V: filming] [ARG1: a segment] [ARGM-LOC: in the gardens of Buckingham Palace] [ARGM-PRP: for an upcoming documentary] , [ARG0: the Queen] compared Trump to a noisy helicopter .
[ARGM-TMP: While filming a segment in the gardens of Buckingham Palace for an upcoming documentary] , [ARG0: the Queen] [V: compared] [ARG1: Trump] [ARG2: to a noisy helicopter] .
